name: pewd.io
description:
this game is a survival io game much like Agar.io 

only except in this one your character will be edgar(pewdiepie's dog) witch gets bigger everytime it eats a pewdiepie head.

this game is still in development but there will be updates soon covering

*enemys 

*multiplayer

i hope you enjoy it. please concider donating and also leaving a comment on the game giving me your thoughts and ideas about the game.

heart. vandal
